abstract: Microsoft said Thursday it had acquired Stratature, a privately held company that specializes in so-called master data management software. Through the acquisition, Microsoft will build master data management tools into its Office System line.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft said Thursday it had acquired Stratature, a privately held company that specializes in so-called master data management software. Through the acquisition, Microsoft will build master data management tools into its Office System line.

headline.main: Microsoft Picks Up Data Management Firm
